name: Trail (itch) (CoolCat7)
description:
Can you go through an unknown world full of various unpredictable obstacles?

You may encounter directional portals along the way, but you never know exactly where it will lead you! 

By the way, stay away from the edges of the screen! 

Input: 

-Click on Left/Right Mouse button to change your direction. 

-Esc to quit from game

Credits:

Music by Hinkik - Ena (https://soundcloud.com/hinkik/ena).

A game made for Weekly Game Jam - Week 214.
